title: Apartment for Rent
posting_body: This apartment is in Everett Massachusetts.
Stunning private first floor unit in a well-maintained two-family house.
This house is located is near the following cities; Revere, Malden, Medford and Chelsea line.
This apartment is near major highways and bus stops are just steps away.
In walkable distance, there are nice convenient stores, bakery, barber shops, public pool, community park, day care, church and much more.
The apartment is ready for new tenancy August 1, 2022.
Showings will take place on Tuesday and Wednesday, July 19, 2022 & July 20, 2022.
Rental application, referrals, credit score from your bank.
Once those requests are satisfied, checks for 1st, last and security deposit for a years lease will be required.
You are required to pay for utilities.
